sentences.en: As ultrasound travels, air distorts the sound wave, creating audible frequencies.
sentences.cn: 超声波传播时, 空气扭曲声波, 这样人就能听到频率.

sentences.cn: 目的:建立应用于介入性超声的计算机辅助多角度穿刺系统.

sentences.en: Objective To explore the clinical value of transcectal ultrasound seminal vesicle diseases.
sentences.cn: 目的:通过应用经直肠超声诊断精囊腺病变而评估其临床价值.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the diagnostic value of ultrasound in acute appendicitis.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨超声检查在急性阑尾炎诊断中的应用价值.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the ultrasound manifestations and pathological foundation thyroglossal cyst.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨甲状腺舌管囊肿的超声及病理基础.

sentences.en: Objective To summarize the experiences of automatic kidney - biopsy guided by ultrasound.
sentences.cn: 摘要目的总结超声引导自动肾活检的经验.

sentences.en: Results: Ultrasound diagnosis of retinal detachment rate of 96.5 percent.

sentences.en: With ocular ultrasound examination , it was demonstrated to be a cystic - like lesion.
